scenes.background: You are on annual leave, enjoying some well-deserved time off to recharge. However, during your time away, a colleague messages you privately, saying there’s an urgent task that needs immediate attention. The request creates a dilemma as you try to balance respecting your time off while feeling the pressure to help with the urgent task.
scenes.description: 'Hey, I know you're on leave, but we have this urgent task that needs to be done right away. Can you help us out?'

options.text: Sure, I can take a quick look at it now.
options.analysis: You chose to assist despite being on leave, showing good emotional control and motivation. However, this may impact your ability to recharge effectively.

options.text: I'm really sorry, but I need this time to recharge. Could someone else handle it?
options.analysis: You prioritized your own well-being, showing good emotional perception and empathy. However, interpersonal balance could be better.

options.text: I can help you for a short time, but I'll need to hand it off to someone else after that.
options.analysis: You chose a middle ground, showing good social skills and emotional balance. However, motivation and self-regulation could be higher.

next_scene.background: After responding to your colleague, you continue your leave. The next day, [Monica] and [Bob] approach you in the break room. [Monica] leads the conversation, while [Bob] stands by, seemingly supportive but silent.
next_scene.description: 'Hey, we noticed you didn’t help out with the task yesterday. It put a lot of pressure on the team. What’s your justification?'

options.text: I thought my break was important to maintain my productivity.
options.analysis: You defended your need for a break, showing empathy for yourself and motivation to stay productive. However, your social skills and emotional regulation could be improved.

options.text: I apologize if it caused any trouble. I needed that time to recharge.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and emotional perception by apologizing and explaining your need for rest. However, your motivation might come into question.

options.text: I understand it was tough, but my break was planned long ago.
options.analysis: You maintained emotional control and social skills. However, your empathy and emotional perception might seem lacking.
